showerReviews.reviewText: This campground has large and level spaces.  The park is very clean and the park rangers are always around and very nice.  We felt very safe here.  There are miles, many miles, of hiking and biking trails.  We loved this park and will definitely visit again.

Great clean park with lots of nature trails and some beautiful wildlife. After hours entrances are difficult to navigate but price was in line with what I'm used to paying for rv sites. Helpful camp host. I wish I could have stayed longer, it stays full up on reservations.

Park is clean and there are lots of walking/biking paths  Rangers are super nice as well. Spots have power but no water or sewer. They do have a dump station and rv fill station as well as lots of water bucket full stations. No laundry and the showers are $1 for 5mins.  Great campground!

Big park with many activities available. The campground is nice and clean, spots are big and leveled. No water or sewer conditions, but a dump station and water station available. Good Verizon and T Mobile service. Rangers are very nice and helpful, patrolling very often. Nice views of the sunset.
No water hook upstairs. Need coins for showers. Great location. $40 per night is great.
